article_title: Moving beyond the health-care rhetoric of the presidential campaigns

article_metadata.description: When complicated and contentious issues take center stage in a presidential campaign, the debate usually turns on politics more than policy. Building consensus for long-term solutions isn’t as important in a campaign as gaining leverage with voters.

og.description: What really is needed are politicians who are willing to talk honestly about the true drivers of health-care costs and the legitimate barriers to access.
og.title: Moving beyond the health-care rhetoric of the presidential campaigns
